quotes.quote: We're invisible. I've never been here with someone else. It's different being invisible with someone.
Invisible things are the only realities.
People who don't appreciate your presence, only deserve your absence
Some things that are invisible and untouchable can nevertheless be seen and felt.
There is nothing invisible in this universe! There is only our lack of eyesight!
There is an invisible world out there, and we are living in it.
There is an invisible garment woven around us from our earliest years; it is made of the way we eat, the way we walk, the way we greet people.
Vision is the art of seeing what is invisible to others.
Invisible threads are the strongest ties.
If invisible people eat invisible food does invisible wind blow invisible trees?
The invisible are always so resolutely invisible, until you see them.
Because when some people are invisible, everyone suffers.
It is only shallow people who do not judge by appearances. The true mystery of the world is the visible, not the invisible.
Invisible things are the only realities; invisible things alone are the things that shall remain.
What delights us in visible beauty is the invisible.
The true mystery of the world is the visible, not the invisible.
An invisible man can rule the world. Nobody will see him come, nobody will see him go. He can hear every secret, he can rob, rapeand kill.
If you're not remarkable, you're invisible.
Everyone has an invisible sign hanging from their neck saying, Make me feel important. Never forget this message when working with people.
All invisible from where we stand the connections come to pass, and though too strong to comprehend they affect us not the less.
The visible is always a mirror of the invisible. The reality is imagined before it manifests itself.
Do the impossible, see the invisible.
Life is invisible. The illusion is that what we perceive is in some way not a reflection of self. Life reflects the field of attention that we're in.
To sense the invisible and to be able to create it, that is art.
It is enjoyable to make things visible which are invisible.
Invisible people see invisible things.
What's invisible to us is also crucial for our own well being.
Every visible and invisible creature is an appearance of God.
When you're invisible, no one can see that you're different.
If you can see the invisible, God will do the impossible.
I make you see things that aren't really there and you believe every word.
We are more closely connected to the invisible than to the visible.
There is an invisible strength within us; when it recognizes two opposing objects of desire, it grows stronger.
When they feel invisible, it's easy for them to leave.
It's what's invisible that creates what's visible.
Love is invisible and comes and goes where it wants, without anyone asking about it.
The world is filled with invisible realities. But, if people do not see or hear, then these realities do not exist.
The invisible is only another unexplored country, a brave new world.
I am seeking for the bridge which leans from the visible to the invisible through reality.
Everything that is visible hides something that is invisible.
Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
Identity is this incredible invisible force that controls your whole life. It's invisible, like gravity is invisible, but it controls your whole life.
The pages are still blank, but there is a miraculous feeling of the words being there, written in invisible ink and clamoring to become visible.
You're only as invisible as you feel, imaginary or not.
Everything in the universe has a purpose. Indeed, the invisible intelligence that flows through everything in a purposeful fashion is also flowing through you.
Whatever you can imagine is waiting for you, fully created in the invisible, and the way to make it visible is to harness the force of love by imagining and feeling what you love.
Have a vision. It is the ability to see the invisible. If you can see the invisible, you can achieve the impossible.
Ninety-nine per cent of who you are is invisible and untouchable.
Sometimes it is a relief to be invisible.
Sometimes the heart sees what is invisible to the eye.
